```{r setup}
library(MicrobiomeBenchmarkData)
library(magrittr)
```


Show datasets

```{r}
df <- dataSets() 
df %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```

Import packages by index:

```{r}
# stool and tongue dorsum samples from the HMP 2012 study in curatedMetagenomicData
x <- getDataSets(x = 7)
x
```
